languages.text: "Я хотел{mf||а} бы познакомить Кибеллу с ритуалами, принятыми в моем кругу. Показать ей, какова жизнь на верхних палубах, так сказать".
languages.translation_comment: Доступно, если Кибелла согласилась на наше предложение в стартовом ивенте

traits.locale_text: "Я хотел{mf||а} бы познакомить Кибеллу с ритуалами, принятыми в моем кругу. Показать ей, какова жизнь на верхних палубах, так сказать".

languages.translation_comment: Доступно, если Кибелла согласилась на наше предложение в стартовом ивенте

languages.text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
languages.original_text: "Я хотел{mf||а} бы познакомить Кибеллу с ритуалами, принятыми в моем кругу. Показать ей, какова жизнь на верхних палубах, так сказать".

traits.locale_text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to the customs practiced among the people of my stature. Show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
"I would like to introduce Kibellah to the customs practiced among the people of my stature. Show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
"I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
"I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
"I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
"I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
"I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
"I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."

languages.text: « J'aimerais faire découvrir à Kibellah certaines des pratiques des gens de mon rang. Lui montrer ce qu'est la vie sur les ponts supérieurs, pour ainsi dire. »
languages.original_text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais faire découvrir à Kibellah certaines des pratiques des gens de mon rang. Lui montrer ce qu'est la vie sur les ponts supérieurs, pour ainsi dire. »

languages.text: «Me gustaría enseñarle a Kibellah algunas de las costumbres practicadas entre la gente de mi estatus... mostrarle la vida en las cubiertas superiores, por así decirlo».
languages.original_text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría enseñarle a Kibellah algunas de las costumbres practicadas entre la gente de mi estatus... mostrarle la vida en las cubiertas superiores, por así decirlo».

languages.text: 「キベラには、私のような身分の人間が取り入れている習慣をいくつか紹介したいものだ。そうだな、上層デッキの生活というものを彼女に見せよう」
languages.original_text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: 「キベラには、私のような身分の人間が取り入れている習慣をいくつか紹介したいものだ。そうだな、上層デッキの生活というものを彼女に見せよう」

languages.text: “我准备向绮贝菈介绍一下我这个阶级的人的社会习俗，让她看看上层甲板的生活是什么样子，大概就是这么回事。”
languages.original_text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: “我准备向绮贝菈介绍一下我这个阶级的人的社会习俗，让她看看上层甲板的生活是什么样子，大概就是这么回事。”

languages.text: "Ich möchte Kibellah einige Bräuche unter Leuten meines Standes zeigen – das Leben auf den oberen Decks sozusagen."
languages.original_text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte Kibellah einige Bräuche unter Leuten meines Standes zeigen – das Leben auf den oberen Decks sozusagen."

languages.text: "Kibellah'ya benim seviyemdeki insanlar arasında süregelen geleneklerden bazılarını tanıtmak istiyorum. Tabiri caizse ona üst güvertelerde nasıl bir hayat yaşandığını göster."
languages.original_text: "I would like to introduce Kibellah to some of the customs practised among people of my stature — show her what life is like on the upper decks, so to speak."
